body:
So as the topic on the top says, i would like to know a few other websites that i can draw anime characters or fan art for free. I am really good at drawing, but i am so dumb and can't find out the sites that allows me to draw. So if anyone is a fan of drawing like me, and would love to tell me the sites would be really appreciated!
:D

title: Where to draw anime characters or people??
